OOC:Due to the fact you fired explosive weapons at Koj back I guessing your 
attck guys are meduim distants away to avoid the back blast. That an Koj was 
on the ground but I'll take air.


::Koj::

Koj was in a defensive stance we I left so Koj knocks Prebon's Lance thrust 
aside as the thrust grazes his shoulder cutting him. His range radar pick up 
the back attacks. Koj cutts off his thrusters and drops.
Slams into to ground banging up his armor taps the GF becon. As he rises to 
his feet. "Kill me then Gloat but then you can't beat me with your little 
girlfriends." Koj thinks tactics then gets a plan.


::Inu-Yasha::
Inu takes Flight mode as 6 thrusters roll out of panels as he Fires off 
hitting top speeds.

::Koj::

Koj hands Split as he releases a thick Wave of Cherry Metallic Blossom 
petals in to the air as a distraction jamming radars and optics. Koj quickly 
grab a Smoke Bomb throw down the Bomb "Ninja Vanish" Koj does the one think 
of that can't be traced and leaves no shadow to see and Clouds his thoughts.
